SEARCH

All Packages

Package Summary
Package
Description
pimperium.commands
This package contains the interface Command and all the Command Cards available in the game.
pimperium.controllers
This package contains the Game Controller (respecting the VCM design pattern)
pimperium.elements
This package contains all the elements relative to the game of Pocket Imperium (Sectors, Hexagons and Ships)
pimperium.models
This package contains the Model (according to the VCM design pattern)
pimperium.players
This package contains all possible types of players for the game Pocket Imperium
pimperium.utils
This package contains utility classes used from different types of classes
pimperium.views
This package contains the View (According to the VCM design pattern), ie all the windows used by the interface
